data.title: Type 1 diabetes events — PADRE Foundation
data.text:
Angels Game

Come on out to the Ballpark for our Annual Angels Game. Join the PADRE team and watch the Los Angeles Angels take on the San Diego Padres.

We will gather under the Big A for some tailgating fun with games, snacks, and meet other kids and families living with T1d before the game.

This event does sell out fast, so get your tickets as soon as possible. Please limit your order to a maximum of 6 tickets so more families get the opportunity to attend!

View Event →

Fashion Show 2024

On Saturday, May 11, 2024, at the Hyatt Regency Resort in Huntington Beach, we will host our 33rd Annual Fashion Show Gala. The Fashion Show will feature our children and teens performing in an empowering event that celebrates imagination, strength, creativity, resilience, and the wonders of childhood, reflecting our theme "Fun in the Sun."

Throughout the night, participants will showcase that even with Type 1 they can still find the fun in life, despite the daily obstacles they may face. Each model will also be displaying the latest fashions on the runway, compliments of Macy’s.

We invite you to join efforts with us as a sponsor of our 2024 Fashion Show Gala, our major fundraising event, which generates two-thirds of the income needed for the PADRE Foundation education and support programs.

Together we can inspire kids to lead AMAZING lives until a cure for Type 1 diabetes is found!

Help us keep childhood special for the children ​of PADRE and enjoy "Fun in the Sun" with Type 1.

View Event →

PADRE Park Day

Enjoy a day at the park with the PADRE team and families living with Type 1 diabetes at Box Canyon Park, Yorba Linda. Bring a lunch, lawn chairs, blankets, low snacks, and everything needed for a great day in the sun. We look forward to seeing you all there! Please register below to receive details and more reminders.

Thank you!

Quarterly In-Person Caregivers Class

For those that care for children living with Type 1 diabetes. The class covers the basics of Type 1 diabetes management, high/low blood sugar intervention, and much more. This class is taught by CHOC clinical staff. This is an in-person class hosted quarterly on the CHOC campus in Orange at the PADRE office on the 4th floor at 505 S. Main St., Orange, CA 92868. For any questions, please call or text 714-714-1906.

Name *

Email *

Phone *

Zip Code *

T1d Age *

Thank you!

View Event →

T1d Teen Event

Aaaarghhhh! Join us for an extravagant night out at Pirates Dinner Adventure in Buena Park, CA. T1d Teens between 13-18 years old will have an exciting night of fun, food, laughter and new friends all while enjoying an interactive and incredible stunt show.

Come and join us as PADRE teens take on the Pirates of the night!

Due to an extremely limited number of tickets, we ask that you please limit your purchase to one ticket for your T1d teen. Thank you for understanding! Please email info@padrefoundation.org for any questions.

View Event →

Fashion Show 2024 Cast Call Photoshoot

This is the time to get involved and make connections! Fashion Show fundraiser 2024 season is here. If your child is interested in being a model in the May 11 show, please sign up below. We will then notify you when we begin booking photoshoot time slots.

We will have 10-minute increments from 3pm to 8pm available. We can’t wait to meet you!

If you have questions, please text 657-584-7663 to learn more about this fundraising event.

Riding the Wave

Parents, grandparents, and teens affected by Type 1 diabetes: we know how hard living with Type 1 diabetes can be, and we've organized a one-of-a-kind event to address feelings you may be experiencing. Take a few hours to reset and connect with others on this T1d journey while listening to an impactful speaker.

Lunch will be provided at this FREE event.

Thank you!

Harvest Carnival

Join us for our annual Harvest Carnival. This is such a great opportunity to meet T1d families and enjoy games, jumpers, crafts, and so much more.

The location is Westmont Elementary School in Anaheim, and you can get your $5 tickets by clicking the button below. Each ticket includes a meal from TK Burgers!

View Event →

Los Angeles County School Nurse Training

Listen to clinical presentations from Los Angeles-based Endocrinologists, watch hands-on demonstrations of Type 1 diabetes technology, and earn Continuing Education Units. Breakfast and lunch will be provided. Tickets are $25. Please fill out the form below, and we’ll contact you for your ticket. For any questions, please email info@padrefoundation.org.

Would you like a vegetarian meal? *

Thank you!

Family Beach Day

Gather your towels, sunblock, boogie boards, snacks, drinks, beach toys, diabetes supplies and anything else you may need to enjoy your day at the PADRE Family Beach Day. Spend the early afternoon with friends and families of Type 1’s at Bolsa Chica State Beach.

The PADRE Team will be there from 11am-2pm and we can’t wait to see you!

This event is FREE to attend but parking is $15. We will be near Lifeguard Tower 23!

Any questions? Call us at 714-714-1906

Turf and Surf Golf Tournament

WE ARE SOLD OUT!

THANK YOU TO ALL THE SPONSORS AND GOLFERS. See you Monday, 7/24/23.

Join the PADRE Foundation and support the children living with Type 1 diabetes all while playing a round of golf at The Huntington Club in Huntington Beach. On Monday, July 24, 2023 enjoy a great day of friends, fairways, and food all while supporting a great cause!

Questions, call 714-509-8330, 714-714-1906 or email Info@PADREfoundation.org

Looking for other ways to donate, please contact Mary@padrefoundation.org. Thank you!

View Event →

Fashion Show 2023 - June 17, 2023

Join us at the Hyatt Regency Huntington Beach Resort and Spa for our 32nd Annual Fashion Show Gala for this wonderful evening of food, friends and a fabulous fashion show starring our children all living with Type 1 diabetes.

Consider getting involved and assisting with plans for the fashion show as this is a great way to join the T1d community and form some wonderful friendships.

Contact the PADRE office at 714-509-8330 or text us at 714-714-1906.

We are looking for sponsorships, silent auction baskets, wine and volunteer help!

For more information click HERE

To purchase tickets click HERE

View Event →

Angel Game Family Night

Bring your family and friends out for a night of baseball to watch the Angels vs. Astros on Monday, May 8, 2023!

Tickets are sold out through PADRE Foundation but you can purchase tickets in or near our section with Angels Baseball.

We will all be sitting in Left Field Pavilion Section 259. Before the game we gather under the Big A to meet all the families, share stories, ask questions and enjoy some pre-game snacks. Hope to see you there.

IF YOU PURCHASED TICKETS THROUGH OUR WEBSITE, THEY WILL BE SENT DIRECTLY TO YOUR REGISTERED EMAIL THIS WEEK FROM MLB.

View Event →

Santa Ana Zoo Day

Bring your family and join us for a fun zoo day in Santa Ana on April 29, 2023 10am-2pm.

Tickets are sold out through PADRE Foundation, but can be purchased at general admission to Santa Ana Zoo.

View Event →

Teen Event at Flightdeck

This event is for teens living with Type 1 diabetes ages 13-18.

No experience necessary as you will be provided in-flight instruction as a Fighter Pilot Combat in the Sky and Rogue Racing Combat on the Track. After the excitement you will be rewarded with food, reflection and more fun. This is a team building activity to meet others and form some friendships.

The event is located at Flightdeck, Anaheim. You won’t want to miss this.

Questions? call 714-714-1906

Tickets are on sale for $15 for each T1d teen here.

View Event →

Family Picnic

Join us for a fun day of park play, games, lunch, and community with other PADRE friends and Family. Location: Huntington Beach Central Park (6622 Lakeview Drive, Huntington Beach, CA 92648)

2023 Fashion Show Cast Call

This is the time to get involved and make connections! We’re gearing up for our 2023 fashion show fundraiser and if your child is interested in being a model or performer in the June 17th show, please text 714-714-1906 to sign up for our cast call on Monday, January 23rd. In the text, please provide your child’s first and last name, their age on 6/17/2023, parent name(s), parent phone number, parent email, and your requested time slot. We have 10 minute increments from 3pm to 8pm available. We can’t wait to meet you!

If you have questions, give us a call and we can tell you all about this exciting event. Please call 714-509-8330 or 714-714-1906.

View Event →

Holiday Party

The fun evening will include: A light dinner, arcade games, crafts, & family photos!

Raffle tickets available for purchase for $1.00/each / Prizes include games, toys and more!

Space is limited, and tickets are no longer available. Please call the office at 714-509-8330 to be added to the waitlist.

Please do not show up at the door for this event without registering. Two days before the event you will receive a confirmation email from PADRE Foundation.

Thank you for your understanding.

View Event →

Riding the Wave of Type 1 diabetes - New location @ Shepherd’s Grove, 4445 Alton Pkwy, Irvine, CA 92604

Parents, grandparents, and teens affected by Type 1 diabetes: we know how hard living with Type 1 diabetes can be, and we've organized a one of a kind event to address feelings you may be experiencing.

Come listen to Dr. William D. Parham, PhD, ABPP present “Finding Light in Dark Spaces: Discovering Strength to Manage Type 1 diabetes”. Take a few hours to reset and connect with others on this T1d journey.

Lunch and a T1d resource fair will be provided at this FREE event.

T1d Toddler Program

Join us for toddler snack ideas and options & hear from CHOC Clinical Dietitian Emely Reyes. You can bring your toddlers as we’ll have some activities for them! We’ll be on the first floor of the CHOC Commerce Tower at 505 S. Main St. in Suite 150. Please register below.

Tickets are $5 and can be purchased by clicking here.

T1d & Celiac Family Night

This is a special event for families of children with Type 1 diabetes and Celiac disease. We will have an information session led by a Certified Dietician and an Endocrinologist to speak on celiac. There will also be samples to taste and handouts with food suggestions!

This will be held at 505 S. Main St., Orange, CA 92868 on the first floor in Suite 150.

Back to School Night

Join us for an informative session about all things back to school! We’ll be covering doctors orders, a 504 plan, school supply kits, testing accommodations, and preparing for a successful school year.

Our Back to School Night will be held at 505 S. Main St., Orange, CA 92868 on the first floor in Suite 150.
